bibl.title: Further Remarks on PUG II, Appendix I .
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I
bibl.author: GOFAS, Dimitri C.

bibl.note: A reedition of P.U.G. I, 20 appeared in P.U.G. II, Appendix I, p. 74; cf. IDEM, Quelques observations sur un papyrus contenant un contrat de société (PUG II Appendice I), Studi in onore di Arnaldo Biscardi. II (Milano, 1982) pp. 499-505. Comparison with the text produced by: Guy WAGNER, Les Oasis d'Égypte à l'époque grecque, romaine et byzantine d'après les documents grecs (Le Caire, 1987) pp. 319-328. - What is then the content of the text? - Text and translation.
GOFAS Dimitri C., Further Remarks on PUG II, Appendix I (= PUG I, 20).
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I (Cairo, 1992) pp. 341-351.
